ActorTalk: Have you heard? Ross from Kuroro Coffee is friends with the Gray Raven Commandant.
Huh? The Gray Raven Commandant? I never knew they had that kind of connection...
I also heard recently that some organization has its eye on Kuroro Coffee.
Seems like the manager saw some big shot he wasn't supposed to see. He's been walking around with a long face every day and keeps disappearing without a trace.
Sigh, I hope the Gray Raven Commandant can help him out of this mess.
